obfuscation: ﻿`` No one knows cruelty'': Women also children of Industrial Revolution Industrial Revolution brought many amendments tto British society. The ways oof life of lowest classes were slowly altered.
original: ﻿ "No one knows the cruelty": Women and children of the Industrial Revolution  The Industrial Revolution brought many changes to British society. The ways of living of the lowest classes were slowly altered.

obfuscation: In this essay, I leave or give by will after one 's death particularly explore the impact; in industrialism on the life inside working-class women. Children, also how living and conditions in work started tto change, during mature industrial full stop in late 19th century.
original: In this essay, I will particularly explore the impact of industrialism on the lives of working-class women and children, and how their living and working conditions began to change during the mature industrial period of the late 19th century.

obfuscation: Industrial production, which had started tto gain body ground inside the 18th century, superseded working class ' traditional way oof earning living: through work in the home. These people now moved tto industrial cities for jobs in factories.
original: Industrial production, which had begun to gain ground in the 18th century, superseded the working classes' traditional way of earning their living: through work in the home. These people now moved to the industrial cities for employment in factories.

obfuscation: On the contrary, The vast urbanisation starting of early 19th century take somebody some. By comparison, to housing problems ( overcrowded dwellings without heating, ventilation. Nor, Sanitation) and a fast-growing slum oof poor factory workers. Meanwhile, The working conditions inside factories were: ten, twelve, maybe thirteen hours of labour under extremely risky circumstances.
original: The vast urbanisation starting in the early 19th century led to housing problems (overcrowded dwellings without heating, ventilation and sanitation) and a fast-growing slum of poor factory workers. The working conditions in the factories were awful: ten, twelve, maybe thirteen hours of labour under extremely risky circumstances.

obfuscation: Many workers were crippled or died young of accidents or diseases oof unhealthy conditions, under the factories. Young children too were employed full-time,. working conditions were, at least, as bad; as those oof adult workers.
original: Many workers were crippled or died young because of accidents or diseases due to the unhealthy conditions in the factories. Young children too were employed full-time, and their working conditions were at least as bad as those of adult workers.

obfuscation: Traditional role, of working-class woman was confined tto home: raising child also take care, of the household, while her husband worked. The money he earned he gave to her, who was given control over the household budget.
original: The traditional role of the working-class woman was confined to the home: raising children and take care of the household, while her husband worked. The money he earned he gave to her, who was given control over the household budget.

obfuscation: This meant that the working-class woman had substantial power within the family. Many did not manage as well as they could have, though: there were reports of the incapability oof many housewives to use the money wisely ( Vicinus, Seven). As 19th century progressed, material standards improving somewhat.
original: This meant that the working-class wife had substantial power within the family. Many did not manage as well as they could have, though: there were reports of the incapability of many housewives to use the money wisely (Vicinus, 7). As the 19th century progressed, material standards improved somewhat.

obfuscation: But all working-class women were not equally affected by such small changes,, as we 'il see. For some, conditions under general comments deteriorated.
original: But all working-class women were not equally affected by these small changes, as we shall see. For some, the conditions in general deteriorated.

obfuscation: Yet, The working-class population of this era could be divided into three categories: relatively well-off artisans, who had middle-class aspirations; average factory labor labour force ( including textile also others industry workers, also miners); also traditional poor, who constituted One/Four oof the urban working class.
original: The working-class population of this era could be divided into three categories: the relatively well-off artisans, who had middle-class aspirations; the average factory labour force (including textile and other industry workers, and miners); and the traditional poor, who constituted 1/4 of the urban working class.

obfuscation: Um, The lives inside women inside two latter groups were fairly alike during. The middle in 19th century,. Without a doubt, towards the end in it things began to happen. New attitudes arose between the average working-class women in number in things.
original: The lives of the women of the two latter groups were fairly alike during the beginning and the middle of the 19th century, but towards the end of it things began to happen. New attitudes arose among the average working-class women due to a number of things.

obfuscation: To illustrate, Real wages increased rapidly from mid-century, also slight improving in living standards arising from such was one thing; education was another- more. More women were literate. In sum, Birth rates began to decline for first time inside working-class families.
original: Real wages increased rapidly from mid-century, and the slight improvement in living standards resulting from this was one thing; education was another - more and more women were becoming literate. The birth rate began to decline for the first time in working-class families.

obfuscation: As a result, Lesser issue; of children, together with the Education Act oof One thous. Eight hundred Seventy that stipulated that all children under oof ten should go to school, led tto more free time for mothers.
original: The lesser number of children, along with the Education Act of 1870 that stipulated that all children under the age of ten should go to school, resulted in more free time for the mothers.

obfuscation: It was a time inside break with tradition that caused considerable distress among these women: they had left traditional resignation that very poorest still felt, resignation which both perpetuated the poverty also made it easier to endure ( Vicinus, Nine).
original: It was a time of break with tradition that caused considerable distress among these women: they had left the traditional resignation that the very poorest still felt, a resignation which both perpetuated the poverty and made it easier to endure (Vicinus, 9).

obfuscation: What the women in working-class families above subsistence level felt was expectations. Hoped that were long way from being satisfied, also due to this, great despair also unhappiness. Inside about same time, these women lost significant economic role, in family.
original: What the women in working-class families above the subsistence level felt was expectations and hopes that were far from being satisfied, and because of this, a great despair and unhappiness. In about the same time, these women lost their important economic role in the family.

obfuscation: The men began tto take control over the family budget, but still expected wives tto manage as, inside the past, although they had less money tto spend. Inflation inside early One thous. Nine hundreds aggravated this problem.
original: The men began to take control over the family budget, but still expected their wives to manage as before, although they had less money to spend. Inflation in the early 1900s aggravated this problem.

obfuscation: While the lot; of many working-class wives remains the same or worsened, towards turn oof the century, that of young, unmarried women changed for the better. Female employment rapidly increase from the One thous. Eight hundred Ninetys onwards,. It was unmarried girls over age of fifteen that made.
original: While the lot of many working-class wives remained the same or worsened towards the turn of the century, that of young, unmarried women changed for the better. Female employment rapidly increased from the 1890s onwards, and it was unmarried girls over the age of fifteen that made the difference.

obfuscation: working inside factories, between school and marriage enter or assume a certain state or condition quite normal; married women,. were not supposed to work outside home.
original: Their working in factories between school and marriage became quite normal; married women, however, were not supposed to work outside home.

obfuscation: The young women enjoyed relative economic affluence,. Liberty, which made it even more difficult for them to adapt tto lives of a married woman- for they did marry, also at approximately the same age as mother. Grandmothers. All traditional patterns were not dissolving.
original: The young women enjoyed a relative economic affluence and freedom, which made it even harder for them to adjust to the life of a married woman - for they did marry, and at about the same age as their mothers and grandmothers. All traditional patterns were not dissolving.

obfuscation: Child labor was widely extended; inside 19th-century Britain. Before industrialism, children had mainly worked as farm workers or domestic servants, or they had worked at home. They too were included; in the workforce, inside industrial production.
original: Child labour was widely extended in 19th-century Britain. Before industrialism, children had mainly worked as agricultural workers or domestic servants, or they had worked at home. Now, they too were included in the workforce of industrial production.

obfuscation: low wages, obedience also small size made them very attractive tto employers inside,. the mining, the textile, also steel-,. Iron industries.
original: Their low wages, obedience and small size made them very attractive to employers in, for example, the mining, the textile, and the steel- and iron industries.

obfuscation: There are no figures tto tell us how many children were use or manipulate to one 's advantage inside factories also else. except that only the Lancashire mills employed some Thirty, Zero children, a year ( Mitchell, Two) Legislation at start inside the 19th century had little impact on life, inside the industrial workers.
original: There are no figures to tell us how many children were exploited in factories and elsewhere, except that only the Lancashire mills employed some 30,000 children a year (Mitchell, 2)   Legislation in the early 19th century had little impact on the lives of the industrial workers.

obfuscation: From the middle; inside century,. a public opinion against child labor was growing, which enabled legislation concerning children 's working conditions. Inside One thous. Eight hundred Seventy Four, it was illegal tto employ children below age in ten full time.
original: From the middle of the century, however, a public opinion against child labour was growing, which enabled legislation concerning the children's working conditions. In 1874, it was illegal to employ children under the age of ten full time.

original: The Education Act of 1870, which I have already mentioned, was extremely important because it started the process which was to become the most important thing for the improvement of the conditions of the working class: its education and political awareness.

obfuscation: As for hours, of work, legislation regulate number inside working hours for women was adopted between One thous. Eight hundred Forty Four,. One thous. Eight hundred Fifty, for instance Ten Hours Act ( One thous. Eight hundred Forty Seven) which established ten hours inside labour per day, also short Saturdays, inside textile industry.
original: As for working hours, legislation regulating the number of working hours for women was adopted between 1844 and 1850, for instance the Ten Hours Act (1847) which established ten hours of labour per day, and short Saturdays, in the textile industry.

obfuscation: These regulation came tto apply tto men. also later other trades as well. Inside One thous. Eight hundred Seventy Five work week was set tto 54-56 One/Two hours,. Twenty Five years see you. the Eight hours workday was achieved by many British workers.
original: These regulations came to apply to the men too, and later other trades as well. In 1875 the working week was set to 54-56 1/2 hours, and 25 years later, the 8 hours workday was achieved by many British workers.

obfuscation: The of women breaking up, from traditional resignation was in an intelligible manner precondition for the improvement inside situation also thus good thing. It took, a lengthy time also lot; inside suffering before anything was achieved, particularly for the poorest.
original: The women's breaking up from traditional resignation was clearly a prerequisite for the improvement of their situation and therefore a good thing. However, it took a long time and a lot of suffering before anything was achieved, especially for the poorest.

obfuscation: It seems that they did not realise themselves with what cruelty they were processed by society.
original: It almost seems that they did not realise themselves with what cruelty they were treated by society.

obfuscation: Indirect reason, for non-improved or worsened social conditions for working-class wives was the Victorian view of women which was finally gaining ground between lower classes,. Which would not alter prime decades of 20th century. Legislation did play part oof the life oof working classes, not least of regulating child labor labour, but general situation, andthe of women especially, depended far more on the prevailing values. Ideas of society as a whole.
original: The indirect reason for the non-improved or worsened social conditions for working-class wives was the Victorian view of women which was eventually gaining ground among the lower classes, and which would not change until the first decades of the 20th century. Legislation did play a part in the lives of the working classes, not least in regulating child labour, but their general situation, and the women's especially, depended much more on the prevailing values and ideas of society as a whole.
